name: eonx-com/externals
description: External libraries shared between EonX applications

suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the http client class
suggest.illuminate/http: Required to use the laravel request bridge
suggest.illuminate/validation: Required to use the validate subscriber and laravel validate bridge
suggest.laravel-doctrine/orm: Required to use the ORM class
suggest.league/flysystem: Required to use the Filesystem class
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the cloud Filesystem class
suggest.monolog/monolog: Required to use the logger class
suggest.paragonie/hidden-string: Required to use hidden string functionality
suggest.nicoswd/php-gpg: Required to use the encryption class
suggest.symfony/validator: Required to use the symfony validator
suggest.vlucas/phpdotenv: Required to use the env helper
